desc: CompTIA Network+ Certification Study Guide: Exam N10-004, Second Edition, offers a practical guide for those interested in pursuing CompTIA Network+ certification. It presents the fundamental terminology needed to perform duties as a network technician and to pass the CompTIA Network+ exam.

details.authors: Naomi Alpern, Dustin L. Fritz, Scott Sweitzer

title: CompTIA Network+ Certification Study Guide
